bibl.title: Arion's Lyre. Archaic Lyric into Hellenistic Poetry.
bibl.note: Earlier (and shorter) versions of various sections of the book appeared elsewhere. - Introduction. - 1. Preserving Her Aeolic Song: Traces of Alexandrian Sappho. - 2. Lyric into Elegy: Sappho Again. - 3. Alcaeus: Voice and Metaphor of the Symposium. - 4. From Samos to Alexandria: Earlier Court Poets and Their Legacies. - 5. Simonides Recalled: Imitations of a Poikilos Original. - Epilogue. Lyric Transformed. - Index.
